name: Stolen Hearts
description:
// Use WASD keys (or arrows) and a mouse . The Left Click inflicts damage on the RoboBots!
In Melee Mode, player 2 should use a USB Gamepad controller on the same system. Jump is Spacebar or the bottom facepad button and use the right trigger to inflict damage! Don't get booped! //

>> This game was created during the 2019 UE4 Winter Jam based on the theme "All is Fair in Love and War" ~ the soundtrack and game were created by LUXI between Feb 14th -19th << thanks for supporting underground artists xoxo <3

Find the soundtrack here:: https://luximusic.bandcamp.com/album/stolen-hearts
